articles.author: Ishaan Gera
articles.title: Growth may have come down to about 5% in Q3: ET poll - The Economic Times
articles.description: The annual outlook is expected to worsen for the next fiscal year as a global slowdown and rising interest rates weigh on growth. The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has projected FY24 growth at 6.4%, but economists expect an even lower number.
articles.content: New Delhi: India's economic growth likely slumped to a median 5.0% in the third quarter, its lowest this fiscal year, according to an ET poll of 11 economists. Forecasts ranged from 4.3% to 5.2%. An … [+2849 chars]

articles.title: Ex-UAE resident’s FreshToHome portal nets Amazon in $104m fund round, gets ready for Saudi Arabia - Gulf News
articles.description: Shan Kadavil, alumni of Sharjah’s Indian High, already has ICD, Investcorp as shareholders
articles.content: Dubai: FreshToHome, a direct-to-consumer portal selling fish and meat started by an ex-UAE resident, has hooked $104 million in its latest funding round, which is led by Amazon. Existing contributors… [+2202 chars]
